wardance.command.setSkillfalse: %1$s can no longer equip or use %2$s
wardance.command.clearSkilltrue: %1$s can no longer equip or use any skills
wardance.command.clearSkillfalse: %1$s can now equip and use all skills
wardance.command.setSkillCategorytrue: %1$s can now equip and use all skills in %2$s
wardance.command.setSkillCategoryfalse: %1$s can no longer equip or use any skills in %2$s
wardance.command.permission.COMBAT.true: %1$s can enter combat mode and cast skills
wardance.command.permission.COMBAT.false: %1$s cannot enter combat mode to cast skills
gamerule.lockWarSkills: Lock skills by default (unlock individually with command)
wardance.manual.partiallearn: You study %s to the best of your abilities
wardance.manual.learn: You study %s thoroughly and memorize it by heart
wardance.manual.unlearnable: You read %s, but cannot understand any of its moves
wardance.manual.invalid: This manual appears to document a physically impossible fighting style...
wardance.manual.style: You cannot understand the footwork outlined in this manual
wardance.manual.autolearn: Unlocks and equips the following skills:
wardance.manual.gui.default: Click on a skill on the right to learn more about it.
wardance.scroll.learned.all: You already know all the skills on this scroll
wardance.scroll.learn: You have learned how to use %s
wardance.scroll.broken: This scroll doesn't seem to teach that skill
wardance.scroll.dummy: This is a placeholder item mostly used for advancements, but it's also a valid scroll for all intents and purposes.
wardance.scroll.random: Teaches a random skill or style
wardance.scroll.random.title: Random
wardance.scroll.random.desc: Teaches a random skill or style
wardance.tooltip.parry: Parries up to %s posture damage per %.2d seconds
wardance.skillselection.title: skill selection
wardance.dashboard.manualize: Convert the written book held in your main hand into a manual
wardance.manualized: You compile your experiences into a manual
wardance.tooltip.sweep.CONE: Attacks all targets in a %s degree fan
wardance.tooltip.sweep.CLEAVE: Attacks all targets in a %s degree vertical fan
wardance.tooltip.sweep.LINE: Attacks all targets in a %s radius cylinder
wardance.tooltip.sweep.IMPACT: Attacks all targets in a %s radius around impact
wardance.tooltip.sweep.CIRCLE: Attacks all targets in a %s radius around you
wardance.tooltip.shift: Hold SHIFT to view combat stats
wardance.tooltip.alt: Hold ALT to view additional item abilities
wardance.tooltip.ctrl: Hold CTRL to view two-handing bonus
wardance.tooltip.resetStyle2: Left click to show info. To reset your style, deselect current skill entry by clicking it again.
wardance.tooltip.resetStyle3: Left click to show info. Right click to reset. Beware, this will also clear your skill selections!
wardance.skill.style: your style does not permit casting this right now
wardance.category.none.name: All Skills
wardance.category.general.name: Expertise
wardance.category.dominance.name: Dominance
wardance.category.dominance.desc: You are mighty. Crush your foes.
wardance.category.resolution.name: Resolution
wardance.category.resolution.desc: Never give, never fall. Be as steady as a wall.
wardance.category.subterfuge.name: Subterfuge
wardance.category.subterfuge.desc: The deadliest strike is the one unseen.
wardance.category.fervor.name: Fervor
wardance.category.fervor.desc: Implacable, unstoppable. Death rains down in a thousand cuts.
wardance.category.perception.name: Perception
wardance.category.perception.desc: See all, reach all. None can escape your grasp.
wardance.category.decay.name: Decay
wardance.category.decay.desc: What order has built, entropy shall destroy.
wardance.category.generosity_avarice.des: I want to help everyone, but I also want it all...
wardance.skill.adrenaline.desc: bonuses gained by not being hit for 5 seconds. These effects scale with rank.
wardance.skill.mark.desc: a §lmark§r can be applied to any living target, and can be viewed by keeping your crosshair over the entity, like posture
wardance.skill.instant_cast.desc: cast by moving your cursor to their slice and releasing.
wardance.skill.holster_cast.desc: cast by performing the specified actions after moving your cursor to their slice and releasing to "select"the skill
wardance.skill.bound_cast.desc: cast by pressing middle click (by default) after moving your cursor to their slice and releasing to "select"the skill
wardance.skill.taken_damage.desc: damage before armor, potion effects, and other similar calculations
wardance.skill.received_damage.desc: damage after armor, potion effects, and other similar calculations
wardance.skill.enemies.desc:
those who are targeting you or one of your allies, and those you have attacked. 
 Non-aggravated neutral mobs and unaware mobs are not considered enemies.
wardance.skill.allies.desc: pets, owners of pets, team members, and all other players if PvP is disabled.
wardance.skill.aux_attack.desc: adds another attack onto your normal attack every %d seconds, dealing %d health damage and %d posture damage.
wardance.skill.true_damage.desc: not affected by armor, enchantments, and other similar effects.
wardance.skill.recover.desc: not affected by healing prevention or multipliers.
wardance.skill.heal.desc: affected by recovery prevention or multipliers. Not affected by regeneration multipliers.
wardance.skill.silence.desc: a silenced target cannot call for help or cast skills that require chanting.
wardance.skill.enhancement.desc: This skill is modified in a special way by the skill effectiveness attribute.
wardance.skill.enhancement.default: Multiplied by the skill effectiveness attribute.
wardance.skill.enhancement.divide: Divided by the skill effectiveness attribute.
wardance.skills_style:
Welcome! 
 Select a style from the left and equip it by clicking the slot on the right to get started.
Skills are colored by their overall theme. You may see styles that place {limitations on the number of colors you may equip; YELLOW}. Generally, styles with {many limitations; GOLD} will have {powerful effects; GOLD}, while styles with {few limitations; AQUA} will have {weaker overall effects; AQUA} or even {negative effects; RED} to compensate for their flexibility.
wardance.skills_general:
Click on a skill, then click on a {gray; GRAY} slot to add it to that slot. You may only equip each skill once. Right click on a slot with a skill to clear that slot. 
 Skill descriptions may include color for emphasis. Mouse over {italicized; ITALIC, GOLD; describes various consistent terminology} or {underlined; UNDERLINE, GOLD; elaborates upon numerical values} text to get description tooltips.
wardance.skill_soft_incompat: Cannot be cast with skills tagged as:
wardance.skill_hard_incompat: Cannot be equipped with skills tagged as:
wardance.sleight_of_hand.name: Sleight of Hand
wardance.sleight_of_hand.desc:
You may only equip {General, BOLD} skills. 
If a cast skill belongs to an archetype, it will randomly trigger the effects of another skill within the archetype instead.
wardance.survivor.name: Survivor
wardance.survivor.desc:
You may equip 1 color. 
Upon {receiving; ITALIC, GRAY; wardance.skill.received_damage.desc} fatal damage at max might, become unstoppable for {10; UNDERLINE; wardance.skill.enhancement.default} seconds. During this time you {cannot heal; RED}, {gain might; RED}, or {take damage; DARK_GREEN}. At the end, {recover; DARK_GREEN, ITALIC; wardance.skill.recover.desc} {health; DARK_GREEN, UNDERLINE; 10% for each entity, or all for a player} for each entity slain during this period.
wardance.tabula_rasa.name: Tabula Rasa
wardance.tabula_rasa.desc:
You may equip Expertise and 1 other color. 
You gain 40% skill effectiveness.
wardance.demon_hunter.name: Demon Hunter
wardance.demon_hunter.desc:
You may equip {Perception;AQUA} and 1 other color. 
Melee attacks {mark; ITALIC, AQUA; wardance.skill.mark.desc} any unmarked targets with 3 stacks of {deadeye; ITALIC, AQUA; ranged attacks deal 2 more posture damage and reduce this mark by 1 stack. Melee attacks dealt to the target while airborne knock demon hunters upwards.}. 
Upon exhausting all deadeye marks or target death, gain 3 attack reach for a single hit.
Charging a projectile weapon midair grants slow fall for 2 seconds and speeds charging by 50%.
wardance.wind_scar.name: Wind Scar
wardance.wind_scar.desc:
You may equip up to 2 colors. 
+1.5 attack reach. 
All melee and skill attacks ignore 15% armor for every block of distance between you and the target.
If your rank is at or above S, and your {adrenaline bonuses; ITALIC, AQUA; wardance.skill.adrenaline.desc} are active, you gain 1 effective level of sweeping edge for every rank tier.
wardance.timberfall.name: Timberfall
wardance.timberfall.desc:
You may equip up to 2 colors. 
After casting a skill, your next melee attack in 3 seconds counts as a skill attack and deals {40%; UNDERLINE; wardance.skill.enhancement.default} extra health and posture damage. 
If this stuns the target, they gain an extra fracture mark.
wardance.frost_fang.name: Frost Fang
wardance.frost_fang.desc:
You may equip up to 2 colors. 
+2 luck. 
Gain {10%; UNDERLINE; wardance.skill.enhancement.default} extra damage every 4 seconds of not attacking, up to 5 times. 
Lose this bonus 2 seconds after any attack.
wardance.flame_dance.name: Flame Dance
wardance.flame_dance.desc:
You may equip up to 2 colors. 
Melee attacks and skills {mark; ITALIC, GRAY; wardance.skill.mark.desc} targets, stacking up to 50 times. Each {mark; ITALIC, GRAY; wardance.skill.mark.desc} increases health and posture damage taken. 
At max might, also detonate {marks; ITALIC, GRAY; wardance.skill.mark.desc} on normal attack. The more {marks; ITALIC, GRAY; wardance.skill.mark.desc} detonated at once, the higher the damage.
wardance.boulder_brace.name: Boulder Brace
wardance.boulder_brace.desc:
You may equip up to 2 colors. 
+50% posture cooldown speed. 
While standing still, gain +50% posture regeneration. 
Automatically consume {1; UNDERLINE; wardance.skill.enhancement.divide} might on being stunned to cancel the stun.
On a critical hit, consume 50% current posture and add {equivalent posture damage; UNDERLINE; wardance.skill.enhancement.default} to your attack.
wardance.pestilent_edge.name: Pestilent Edge
wardance.pestilent_edge.desc:
You may equip up to 2 colors. 
Your melee attacks deal 1 extra health and posture damage for each debuff on the target.
wardance.gold_rush.name: Gold Rush
wardance.gold_rush.desc:
You may equip {Evergetism;GOLD} and 2 other colors. 
Every time you gain 1 might or score a kill, {mark; ITALIC, GOLD; wardance.skill.mark.desc} yourself with greed, up to 10 stacks.
Greed expires after 5 seconds unless refreshed, and is fully passed to the attacker when the {marked; ITALIC, GOLD; wardance.skill.mark.desc} entity is melee attacked.
Greed increases {posture damage taken;RED} by 10% per stack, but also grants an extra level of looting at stack level 1, 3, 6, and 10.
wardance.unyielding_spirit.name: Unyielding Spirit
wardance.walk_of_dionysus.name: Walk of Dionysus
wardance.hopping_mad.name: Hopping Mad
wardance.hopping_mad.desc:
You may equip up to 3 colors. 
Your max posture is halved, but you recover {half; UNDERLINE; wardance.skill.enhancement.default} of lost posture after landing from a jump.
wardance.doppelsoldner.name: Doppelsöldner
wardance.doppelsoldner.desc:
You may equip up to 3 colors. 
In combat mode, your main hand weapon is treated as if it was two-handed, but you gain {0.4; UNDERLINE; wardance.skill.enhancement.default} attack speed.
wardance.blood_tax.name: Blood Tax
wardance.blood_tax.desc:
You may equip up to 4 colors. 
{All skill spirit costs are converted to health costs.;RED}.
wardance.unstable_spirit.name: Unstable Spirit
wardance.unstable_spirit.desc:
You may equip up to 4 colors. 
Upon casting a skill, create a non-griefing and {indiscriminate;RED} {explosion;UNDERLINE;no knockback. Radius, health damage, and posture damage equal to 2 + (spirit cost) + 2*(might cost) and scaled with skill effectiveness} at your location.
wardance.gamblers_whimsy.name: Gambler's Whimsy
wardance.gamblers_whimsy.desc:
You may equip up to 5 colors.
Your skill effectiveness is rolled as a random value between 0 and the difference between you and the target's luck. 
Only one of your active skills is enabled. 
Your effective luck for this calculation is increased by 1, and one more skill is enabled, for {every other level of rank; UNDERLINE; wardance.skill.enhancement.default} you earn. The list of enabled skills are randomly refreshed after every skill cast.
wardance.sifu.name: Sifu
archetype.heavy_blow.name: Heavy Blow
archetype.heavy_blow.desc:
When landing a {critical hit; GOLD}: 
bind the target's parrying hand for 1.5 seconds if it was parried, 
disable their shield for 3 seconds if it was blocked. 
Recharges after 3 attacks.
Offensive bonuses are not applied if the target has Iron Guard active.
wardance.vital_strike.name: Vital Strike
wardance.vital_strike.desc: In addition, this attack's crit damage is multiplied by {1.5; UNDERLINE; Multiplied by your skill effectiveness attribute squared.}.
wardance.silencer.name: Silencer
wardance.silencer.desc:
When launching an unaware attack, force a critical, bind both hands, and {mark; ITALIC, GRAY; wardance.skill.mark.desc}: {silence; ITALIC, GRAY; wardance.skill.silence.desc} the target for {3; UNDERLINE; wardance.skill.enhancement.default} seconds. 
Recharges after 5 hits, automatically refreshes if you kill a {silenced; ITALIC, GRAY; wardance.skill.silence.desc} target.
wardance.poise.name: Poise
wardance.stagger.name: Stagger
wardance.stagger.desc:
When landing a {critical hit; GOLD}: 
bind both of the target's hands for 1.5 seconds.
This critical hit's health damage is equal to your skill effectiveness attribute, and the original crit multiplier is applied to posture twice. 
Recharges after 3 attacks.
Offensive bonuses are not applied if the target has Iron Guard active.
wardance.leverage.name: Leverage
wardance.leverage.desc: Crit damage scales with distance between you and target, up to {300%; UNDERLINE; wardance.skill.enhancement.default}.
wardance.momentum.name: Momentum
wardance.momentum.desc: Can no longer crit naturally, every (8-rank) attack {automatically crits;GOLD}. Deal an extra {0.01; UNDERLINE; wardance.skill.enhancement.default} posture damage and {0.5%; UNDERLINE; wardance.skill.enhancement.default} crit damage, {doubled with every rank;GOLD}.
archetype.iron_guard.name: Iron Guard
archetype.iron_guard.desc:
Brace yourself for impact, granting additional abilities to your parry. 4 second cooldown.
Offensive bonuses are not applied if the melee attacker had Heavy Blow active.
wardance.return_to_sender.name: Return to Sender
wardance.return_to_sender.desc: Ranged attacks cost {1.5x; RED, UNDERLINE; wardance.skill.enhancement.divide} posture to parry, the projectile is {reflected; GREEN} back at its shooter with full force.
wardance.afterimage.name: Afterimage
wardance.afterimage.desc: If sneaking while parrying a melee attack, emit a smoke cloud that {blinds;GRAY} {enemies; ITALIC; wardance.skill.enemies.desc} within {several; UNDERLINE; equal to posture damage taken multiplied by skill effectiveness} blocks and become {invisible;GRAY} for 1 second. 10 second cooldown.
wardance.backpedal.name: Backpedal
wardance.backpedal.desc: Parrying while airborne converts posture damage into {knockback;AQUA, UNDERLINE; wardance.skill.enhancement.default}. 4 second cooldown.
wardance.mikiri.name: Mikiri
wardance.mikiri.desc: {Negate;DARK_GREEN} posture damage on the next parry. {7; UNDERLINE; wardance.skill.enhancement.divide} second cooldown, every attack or parry decreases cooldown by 1 second.
wardance.overpower.name: Overpower
wardance.overpower.desc:
Take full posture damage on parry, but also {reflect; UNDERLINE; wardance.skill.enhancement.default} it onto your attacker, then {consume posture; UNDERLINE; wardance.skill.enhancement.default} from them as if they parried a hit from the parrying weapon. 
In addition to 4 seconds of cooldown, this ability only recharges once you regain max posture.
wardance.recovery.name: Recovery
wardance.recovery.desc: Parrying below {25%; UNDERLINE; wardance.skill.enhancement.default} posture will not incur a posture regeneration cooldown, and will refresh the might grace period.
archetype.coup_de_grace.name: Coup de Grace
archetype.coup_de_grace.desc:
When toggled, an attack on an exposed target will deal {20%; UNDERLINE; wardance.skill.enhancement.default} of their lost health as {true damage; ITALIC,RED; wardance.skill.true_damage.desc} instead of the usual 10% max health damage. 
If the target would die from a successful coup de grace, it is marked with an icon (unlike other skills, this is not a real {mark; ITALIC; wardance.skill.mark.desc}), all damage dealt to it is converted to equivalent posture damage, and it will be instantly exposed on the next stun. 
Cast when active to end this skill. 
Recharge after 3 skill casts, costs 2 might.
wardance.decapitate.name: Decapitate
wardance.decapitate.desc: This kill is guaranteed to {drop a head;GOLD}, or have its {looting;GOLD} level increased by 3 if the target lacks a harvestable head.
wardance.rupture.name: Rupture
wardance.rupture.desc:
Drain half of the target's spirit to create a large explosion. The size of the explosion increases with the target's max posture, and its damage increases with the target's spirit.
[stats]
Explosion radius: sqrt(max posture)
Explosion damage: (spirit before drain) *2
wardance.bite_the_dust.name: Bite the Dust
wardance.bite_the_dust.desc:
Passive. Deal {1; UNDERLINE; wardance.skill.enhancement.default} {true damage; ITALIC; wardance.skill.true_damage.desc} when stunning a target. 
For every time this target has already been stunned by an user of this skill, the damage is doubled.
wardance.reaping.name: Reaper's Laugh
wardance.reaping.desc:
{Bound cast; ITALIC; wardance.skill.bound_cast.desc}: perform a wide sweeping attack that hits everything in your attack range. 
This attack cannot be parried, but will alert all targets, dealing {percentage max health; UNDERLINE; equal to your skill effectiveness attribute multiplied by 10} extra damage; 
targets with health lower than this threshold will take {true damage; GOLD, ITALIC; wardance.skill.true_damage.desc} and instantly {refresh this skill; DARK_GREEN}. 
Recharge after 6 skill casts.
wardance.frenzy.name: Frenzy
wardance.frenzy.desc: Upon triggering, instantly cool down all other physical skills.
wardance.danse_macabre.name: Danse Macabre
wardance.danse_macabre.desc: The percentage of lost health dealt scales with your rank, up to 40%.
archetype.kick.name: Kick
archetype.kick.desc:
{Bound Cast; ITALIC; wardance.skill.bound_cast.desc}. 
Deal {4; UNDERLINE; wardance.skill.enhancement.default} posture damage and {2; UNDERLINE; wardance.skill.enhancement.default} falling block damage to a target in 3 blocks. 
Recharge after 4 attacks, costs 1 spirit.
wardance.trample.name: Trample
wardance.trample.desc: Deal {1.5x more posture damage;GRAY,UNDERLINE; wardance.skill.enhancement.default} if doing so would stun the target. Upgrades a stun into {knockdown; GRAY} if possible.
wardance.shadowless_kick.name: Shadowless Kick
wardance.shadowless_kick.desc:
{Bound Cast; ITALIC; wardance.skill.bound_cast.desc}. 
Deal 2 posture damage and 1 falling block damage to a target in 3 blocks.
0.25 seconds after casting, cast again if possible; this can {repeat;DARK_AQUA} up to 7 times.
{Enhancement:; ITALIC; wardance.skill.enhancement.desc} damage is multiplied once by skill effectiveness for every consecutive kick. 
Recharge after 6 attacks, costs 2 spirit.
wardance.tackle.name: Tackle
wardance.tackle.desc: +2 range on kick and dash forward, gaining {half a second; UNDERLINE; wardance.skill.enhancement.default} of {invulnerability;DARK_GREEN}.
wardance.tornado.name: Tornado
wardance.sabaton_smash.name: Sabaton Smash
wardance.sabaton_smash.desc: Consume 1 posture to knock the target backwards, additionally dealing {armor/4; UNDERLINE; wardance.skill.enhancement.default} posture and falling block damage if they {hit a wall;AQUA}.
wardance.backflip.name: Backflip
wardance.backflip.desc: Use the reaction force to leap back and {heal; ITALIC, DARK_GREEN; wardance.skill.heal.desc} {30%; UNDERLINE; wardance.skill.enhancement.default} lost posture, adds 0.3 rank.
archetype.grapple.name: Grapple
archetype.grapple.desc:
{Holster cast; ITALIC; wardance.skill.holster_cast.desc}. Recharge after 7 attacks, costs 1 spirit. 
Stuns caused by this skill are upgraded to {knockdowns; GRAY}.
wardance.throw.name: Throw
wardance.throw.desc:
Land two unarmed strikes on the same target within 2 seconds to throw them off balance for {7; UNDERLINE; Multiplied by your skill effectiveness attribute squared.} posture damage. 
Successfully stunning the target will immediately refresh this skill and cause you to pick up the target until their knockdown ends. 
{Bound Cast; ITALIC; wardance.skill.bound_cast.desc}: 
while not carrying any entity, pick up a sneaking player or any stunned entity until they recover or stop sneaking.
while carrying any entity, instead {throws;AQUA} them towards where you are looking. Should they hit a {wall;GOLD}, deal {10; UNDERLINE; Multiplied by your skill effectiveness attribute squared.} falling block damage. If they collide with an entity, deal {7; UNDERLINE; Multiplied by your skill effectiveness attribute squared.} posture damage and {3; UNDERLINE; Multiplied by your skill effectiveness attribute squared.} falling block damage to the collided entity as well.
wardance.suplex.name: Suplex
wardance.submission.name: Submission
wardance.submission.desc:
Land two unarmed strikes on the same target within 2 seconds to throw them off balance for {7; UNDERLINE; wardance.skill.enhancement.default} posture damage. 
Additionally leeches {posture; UNDERLINE; equal to 25% of your current armor multiplied by your skill effectiveness attribute} from the target. If the target is stunned, refund 1 spirit.
wardance.cursed_palms.name: Cursed Palms
wardance.cursed_palms.desc:
Land two unarmed strikes on the same target within 2 seconds to throw them off balance for {7; UNDERLINE; Multiplied by your skill effectiveness attribute squared.} posture damage. 
Successfully stunning the target will immediately refresh this skill and cause you to pick up the target until their knockdown ends. 
{Bound Cast; ITALIC; wardance.skill.bound_cast.desc}: 
while not carrying any entity, pick up a sneaking player or any stunned entity until they recover or stop sneaking.
while carrying any entity, instead {throws;AQUA} them towards where you are looking. Upon impact, they gain nausea and emit a lingering cloud of every {negative effect;LIGHT_PURPLE, UNDERLINE; this cloud has a base radius of 5 and lasts 7 seconds with no shrinking, modified by the skill effectiveness attribute} they are afflicted with.
wardance.wrestle.name: Wrestle
wardance.wrestle.desc:
{Bound Cast; ITALIC; wardance.skill.bound_cast.desc}. Consume 1 might and 2 spirit to pin down a target in range 3 while unarmed in both hands, {marking; ITALIC; wardance.skill.mark.desc} them with {10; UNDERLINE; wardance.skill.enhancement.default} charges. 
While {marked; ITALIC; wardance.skill.mark.desc}, targets suffer from 30% {reduced attack speed;DARK_AQUA}, 20% {extra posture damage;DARK_AQUA}, will be {pulled; DARK_AQUA} towards the caster if they try to escape a 2 block radius, and will always be {knocked down if stunned;DARK_AQUA}. 
1 charge is consumed each time whenever the target deals damage or is dealt damage. If it successfully deals damage to you, {2 additional charges are reduced;RED}. 
The {mark; ITALIC; wardance.skill.mark.desc} ends if charges run out, you swap to a non-unarmed item, or after 10 seconds. After this, it has another 10 seconds of cooldown.
archetype.shield_bash.name: Shield Bash
archetype.shield_bash.desc:
§7§o"Tell me how the grass tastes, little man!"§r
{Holster cast; ITALIC; wardance.skill.holster_cast.desc}, the next attack with a shield has its posture damage multiplied by your skill effectiveness attribute.
Costs 1 spirit, cools down after 4 non-shield-bash shield attacks.
wardance.pummel.name: Pummel
wardance.pummel.desc: Passive. Your shield does damage equal to {100%; UNDERLINE; wardance.skill.enhancement.default} of its base posture damage.
wardance.rim_punch.name: Rim Punch
wardance.rim_punch.desc: Smash the shield's rim into the target, nauseating them for 5 seconds and {knocking them back; UNDERLINE; wardance.skill.enhancement.default}. This bash always deals 5 posture damage regardless of your shield's damage rating.
wardance.overbear.name: Overbear
wardance.foot_slam.name: Foot Slam
wardance.foot_slam.desc: Slam the shield into the target's foot, slowing and {confusing; ITALIC; confused targets are treated as distracted until the confusion wears off.} them for {3; UNDERLINE; wardance.skill.enhancement.default} seconds.
wardance.berserk.name: Berserk
wardance.berserk.desc:
Your next attack drives you into a frenzy by consuming all might.
While berserk is active, you {treat two-handed weapons as one-handed; GREEN} and gain 20% total attacks speed.
The duration of your berserk begins at 3 seconds, and scales with {missing health; RED}, {might consumed;GOLD}, and the {skill effectiveness attribute;AQUA}. The duration is refreshed whenever you score a kill.
Requires at least 1 might to cast.
wardance.lockdown.name: Lockdown
wardance.lockdown.desc: {Bind;DARK_GREEN} the target's main hand and your shield hand for an amount of time equal to the posture damage dealt.
archetype.feint.name: Feint
archetype.feint.desc:
{Holster cast; ITALIC; wardance.skill.holster_cast.desc}. The next attack does not sweep and does not hit, {binds;DARK_GREEN} both of the target's hands for 1 second, {marks; ITALIC; wardance.skill.mark.desc} the target with 6 stacks, and refunds {half; UNDERLINE; wardance.skill.enhancement.default} hand cooldown. 
Bind time is {reduced; RED} by 0.1 seconds for every existing stack; 1 stack is removed every normal attack on the target. 
Costs 2 spirit and unbinds itself after use.
wardance.followup.name: Followup
wardance.followup.desc: Refunds all cooldown. Passive: attacking a target with both hands bound refunds {half; UNDERLINE; wardance.skill.enhancement.default} cooldown.
wardance.upper_hand.name: Upper Hand
wardance.upper_hand.desc: Recover an equivalent amount of posture. Reduce the target's armor by 2 and gain 2 armor for 10 seconds. You may gain up to 20 armor in this manner.
wardance.smirking_shadow.name: Smirking Shadow
wardance.smirking_shadow.desc: While active, the target is treated as {unaware;GRAY}.
wardance.scorpion_sting.name: Scorpion Sting
wardance.scorpion_sting.desc: Applies 10 seconds of poison, then increases the amplifier of all negative status effects on the target by 1.
wardance.spirit_resonance.name: Spirit Resonance
wardance.spirit_resonance.desc:
{Skill damage; DARK_AQUA} to a {marked; ITALIC; wardance.skill.mark.desc} target is {increased; DARK_GREEN} by 2, deals 2 additional posture damage, and reduces the {mark; ITALIC; wardance.skill.mark.desc} by 1 stack. 
This ability has a 1 second cooldown between triggers.
wardance.capricious_strike.name: Capricious Strike
wardance.capricious_strike.desc: Attacking a {marked; ITALIC; wardance.skill.mark.desc} target reduces cooldown of all other physical skills by 1.
archetype.prowess.name: Prowess
archetype.prowess.desc: History isn't written by those who are right, it's written by those who are left.
wardance.crown_champion.name: Crown Champion
wardance.crown_champion.desc: Gain {15%; UNDERLINE; wardance.skill.enhancement.default} extra attack damage per level of might; your might gain is increased by 15% per {missing might; UNDERLINE; each additional point of skill effectiveness counts as 1 missing might for this purpose.}.
wardance.vengeful_might.name: Vengeful Might
wardance.vengeful_might.desc: Attackers of you or your allies within 10 blocks will be highlighted and {marked; ITALIC; wardance.skill.mark.desc} with the {damage; UNDERLINE; wardance.skill.enhancement.default} they have {inflicted; ITALIC;wardance.skill.received_damage.desc}; successfully dealing damage to a {marked; ITALIC; wardance.skill.mark.desc} target deals up to {double damage; UNDERLINE; wardance.skill.enhancement.default}, and grants half of the added damage in might, by consuming charge from the {mark; ITALIC; wardance.skill.mark.desc}.
wardance.prideful_might.name: Prideful Might
wardance.prideful_might.desc: Might gain is {increased by 50%;GOLD}, but all might is lost when {receiving;RED;wardance.skill.received_damage.desc} damage. Your {evasion;GOLD} is refreshed every {2 levels; UNDERLINE; wardance.skill.enhancement.divide} of might.
wardance.hidden_might.name: Hidden Might
wardance.hidden_might.desc: Gain 0.25 might from an unaware attack. The distance at which you are detected is reduced by 30%; for every level of might you gain, 3% of this detection is converted to speed.
wardance.elemental_might.name: Elemental Might
wardance.elemental_might.desc: Attacking a target causes it to take (might/3) more damage from non-physical sources for the next 5 seconds; gain 1 might when an entity in 5 blocks dies from non-physical damage.
wardance.masters_might.name: Master's Might
wardance.masters_might.desc: When attacking a target without knockback immunity, slow others nearby for half a second and render the hit target immune to knockback for 5 seconds, gaining 1 might. Cannot attack stunned targets, but greatly knocks back on stun ignoring immunity. Upon dealing fatal damage, cancel the damage and stun the target for 6 seconds instead. After recovering, the target will run away, dropping triple the normal exp and no loot.
archetype.judgment.name: Judgment
wardance.amputation.name: Amputation
wardance.brutalize.name: Brutalize
wardance.brutalize.desc: Might cost per cast increased to 5. Intimidate hostile targets in a 10 block radius on every cast, causing them to take 20% more posture damage from you for 10 seconds. Successfully judging a target stuns it for double the usual time, nearby {enemies; ITALIC; wardance.skill.enemies.desc} with less health than the judged target are compelled to flee in fear.
wardance.viral_decay.name: Viral Decay
wardance.viral_decay.desc:
{Mark; DARK_PURPLE, ITALIC; wardance.skill.mark.desc} a reachable target with an infectious rot, dealing {decay damage; GRAY, UNDERLINE; equal to its stack count multiplied by skill effectiveness} every second. 
{Marked; DARK_PURPLE, ITALIC; wardance.skill.mark.desc} deaths create an explosion, dealing 2 {true damage; RED; wardance.skill.true_damage.desc} and {marking; DARK_PURPLE, ITALIC; wardance.skill.mark.desc} non-{ally; AQUA, ITALIC; wardance.skill.allies.desc} targets in a 3 block radius.
Costs 2 might.
wardance.fever_dream.name: Fever Dream
wardance.fever_dream.desc: Upon successfully judging a target, compel entities in a 7 block radius to attack each other randomly. If this affects another {marked; ITALIC; wardance.skill.mark.desc} entity, they will repeat this effect. The effect can be chained up to 3 times.
wardance.lichtenberg_scar.name: Lichtenberg Scar
wardance.lichtenberg_scar.desc: Each cast deals no extra damage but only costs 1 might and 1 second of cooldown. Successfully judging a target deals 20% current health electric damage and summons lightning above all other {marked; ITALIC; wardance.skill.mark.desc} targets in a 30 block radius, dealing 10% current health as electric damage.
wardance.combo_breaker.name: Combo Breaker
wardance.combo_breaker.desc: Can only be cast once per 10 seconds. The {mark; ITALIC; wardance.skill.mark.desc} is also refreshed by casting skills on the target, and lasts 5 seconds regardless of stack. When the mark expires or you cast over 10 skills on the target, deal (4*skills cast on target)% current health damage.
archetype.memento_mori.name: Memento Mori
archetype.memento_mori.desc: You only live twice: once when you are born, and once when you look death in the face.
wardance.bloodlust.name: Bloodlust
wardance.bloodlust.desc: For every 1% health lost, you gain {2%; UNDERLINE; wardance.skill.enhancement.default} extra might and {1%; UNDERLINE; wardance.skill.enhancement.default} extra damage.
wardance.rapid_clotting.name: Rapid Clotting
wardance.rapid_clotting.desc: Gain {1; UNDERLINE; wardance.skill.enhancement.default} armor for every 5% max health lost.
wardance.shadow_dive.name: Shadow Dive
wardance.shadow_dive.desc:
When {receiving; ITALIC; wardance.skill.received_damage.desc} damage that exceeds {25%; UNDERLINE; wardance.skill.enhancement.divide} of current health, cap the damage and dive into your own shadow for {8; UNDERLINE; wardance.skill.enhancement.default} seconds, gaining {speed and invisibility;AQUA}. 
{Transfer aggression;GRAY} of nearby {enemies; ITALIC; wardance.skill.enemies.desc} onto the first target you collide with or attack in this state. 
Cools down once health is full again.
wardance.necrosis.name: Necrosis
wardance.necrosis.desc:
Your max health is {increased; UNDERLINE; 14% per rank, scaling with skill effectiveness and applied after all health increases} by up to 100% depending on your rank. 
{You cannot heal above your actual max health; RED}
wardance.heal_shock.name: Heal Shock
wardance.heal_shock.desc: {Healing will be canceled; RED} if there is an {enemy; ITALIC; wardance.skill.enemies.desc} in 6 blocks, with the healed amount instead used to knock back and deal {electric;AQUA} {damage; UNDERLINE; wardance.skill.enhancement.default} to them.
wardance.selfish_mascot.name: Selfish Mascot
wardance.selfish_mascot.desc:
Above half health, {grant 2 luck; GOLD} to all targets in a 6 block radius.
Under half health, {absorb the luck; RED} of all targets in a 6 block radius.
wardance.static_discharge.name: Static Discharge
wardance.static_discharge.desc: Accumulate {damage; UNDERLINE; wardance.skill.enhancement.default} {taken; ITALIC; wardance.skill.taken_damage.desc} as charge, to a limit of (max health). On a melee attack, knock back and deal {electric;AQUA} {damage; UNDERLINE; wardance.skill.enhancement.default} to {enemies; ITALIC; wardance.skill.enemies.desc} in a 5 block radius; damage and knockback scales with charge.
wardance.pound_of_flesh.name: Pound of Flesh
wardance.pound_of_flesh.desc: Active skill, consumes all your spirit. When attacking, {consume;RED} {10%; RED, UNDERLINE; wardance.skill.enhancement.divide} {max health;RED} to deal {7%; UNDERLINE; wardance.skill.enhancement.default} of the target's {max health; GOLD}, or {15%; UNDERLINE; wardance.skill.enhancement.default} of the target's {max posture;GOLD} if the attack was parried. Lasts until (5*spirit) seconds have elapsed or your spirit fully regenerates.
archetype.descend.name: Descend
wardance.phantom_dive.name: Phantom Dive
wardance.phantom_dive.desc:
Every {7; UNDERLINE;wardance.skill.enhancement.divide} blocks fallen before an attack reduces the attack's awareness tier (alert->distracted->unaware); every reduction beyond unaware paralyzes the target for 3 seconds. 
Attacking while falling resets fall distance.
archetype.hex.name: Hex
archetype.hex.desc: {Bound Cast; ITALIC; wardance.skill.bound_cast.desc}. {Mark; ITALIC; wardance.skill.mark.desc} a target that may be reached. Costs 1 spirit, {15; UNDERLINE; wardance.skill.enhancement.divide} second cooldown.
wardance.curse_of_misfortune.name: Curse of Misfortune
wardance.curse_of_misfortune.desc:
The target's {luck; AQUA} is reduced by 2 for 10 seconds. 
For every {luck roll that you failed; AQUA} since the last cast of this skill, their luck is {further reduced; AQUA} by 1, to a maximum of -13.
wardance.curse_of_echoes.name: Curse of Echoes
wardance.curse_of_echoes.desc: For 8 seconds, the target takes {true damage; ITALIC, RED; wardance.skill.true_damage.desc} equal to 40% of incoming damage; this effect has a 1 second cooldown between triggers.
wardance.itchy_curse.name: Itchy Curse
wardance.itchy_curse.desc:
{Mark; ITALIC; wardance.skill.mark.desc} the target with paresthesia. 
{Paresthesia;DARK_GREEN} lasts 3 seconds, but only ticks down if the target is {not moving;DARK_GREEN}. 
The target is treated as {distracted;DARK_GREEN}, and will be immobilized with both its {hands bound;DARK_GREEN} every 3 seconds.
wardance.gangrene.name: Gangrene
wardance.gangrene.desc: For the next 8 seconds, the target loses the ability to heal.
wardance.unravel.name: Unravel
wardance.unravel.desc: Violently {remove;GOLD} one level from every {potion effect;GOLD} curable by milk on the target, creating a 7-block {explosion;GOLD} that deals 6 damage.
wardance.black_mark.name: Black Mark
wardance.black_mark.desc: Saps the target of its vitality. For 10 seconds, any creature that deals melee damage to the target will heal for 1/3 the damage dealt and drain either 2 posture or 3 spirit, whichever the attacker has less of, and recover half that amount.
wardance.petrify.name: Petrify
wardance.petrify.desc:
Slows the target by 30% for 7 seconds, then {petrify;GRAY} them for 3 seconds. 
Petrified targets lose all absorption and are treated as {unaware;GRAY}, but gain 7 armor. 
When attacking a petrified target, create a cloud of dust that ends petrification, then {enfeeble;GRAY} and deal 5 posture damage to entities in 7 blocks.
archetype.morale.name: Morale
wardance.back_and_forth.name: Back and Forth
wardance.archers_paradox.name: Archer's Paradox
wardance.archers_paradox.desc:
Regain 1 spirit when your {projectile;AQUA} hits a target or when you attack a {non-alert;AQUA} target. 
This ability has a 3 second cooldown.
wardance.confidence.name: Confidence
wardance.confidence.desc:
The more spirit you have, the faster your spirit regeneration, to a limit of 200% speed at max spirit and 50% speed at none. 
{Enhancement:; ITALIC; wardance.skill.enhancement.desc} extra skill effectiveness is treated as effectively having extra spirit.
wardance.apathy.name: Apathy
wardance.apathy.desc: Your max spirit is {set to 1; RED}, but your spirit cooldown speed is {doubled; DARK_GREEN}, and you {instantly recover all spirit; DARK_GREEN} when the cooldown ends.
wardance.natural_sprinter.name: Natural Sprinter
wardance.natural_sprinter.desc:
You are very dangerous over short distances. 
Your max spirit is {doubled; DARK_GREEN}, but its regeneration speed is {reduced to a third;RED}; you recover 3 spirit on a {kill;RED}.
wardance.speed_demon.name: Speed Demon
wardance.speed_demon.desc: Halve spirit cooldown on a dodge and regain spirit on attack based on speed. The faster you are compared to your target, the more spirit is regenerated, capped at 1.
wardance.lady_luck.name: Lady Luck
wardance.lady_luck.desc: When casting a skill there is a {chance;GREEN;(1+l)/(5+l) where l is the luck difference between you and your target, or just your luck if there is no target, multiplied by your skill effectiveness attribute} (to a minimum of 20%) to {negate the spirit cost;GREEN} of the skill. This chance {stacks;GREEN} if it fails to trigger.
wardance.shield_crush.name: Shield Crush
wardance.shield_crush.desc:
{Bound Cast; ITALIC; wardance.skill.bound_cast.desc}. Consume 1 might and 1 spirit to crush a target with your shield. 
While active, both sides take no knockback and are slowed by 80%, targets additionally suffer from 30% {reduced attack speed;GOLD} and 20% {extra posture damage;GOLD}, and will be instantly exposed on stun. 
{The posture of both sides will continuously drain, faster and faster, until one side falls; RED}. 
The state ends if you swap to a non-shield item, take your crosshair off your target, or one side is stunned. After this, it has another 10 seconds of cooldown.
wardance.flurry.name: Flurry
wardance.flurry.desc:
Whirl into a frenzy, cutting down all who oppose you. 
While active, your might continuously {drains; UNDERLINE; wardance.skill.enhancement.divide}, you cannot gain might, your hands cool down twice as fast, and your damage is {halved;RED}. 
 You will automatically use both hands to sweep attack all targets in range 3 whenever possible, {without any knockback;YELLOW}.
This state ends when your might is reduced to 0.
wardance.montante.name: Montante
wardance.montante.desc:
Grab your weapon with both hands and become an unstoppable whirling force. 
While active, your might continuously {drains; UNDERLINE; wardance.skill.enhancement.divide}, you cannot gain might, and your damage is {halved;RED}. 
 You will automatically use your main hand to sweep attack in a circle twice every second.
Incoming attacks and projectiles are automatically parried, dealing high retaliation posture damage to attackers.
This state ends when your might is reduced to 0.
archetype.five_element_fist.desc:
A traditional unarmed martial art, this unarmed strike has reduced knockback and will change to another form on attack, in the order of {water;AQUA;wardance.water_uppercut.desc}-{wood;GOLD;wardance.wooden_jab.desc}-{fire;RED;wardance.fiery_lunge.desc}-{earth;DARK_GREEN;wardance.earthen_sweep.desc}-{iron;LIGHT_GRAY;wardance.iron_chop.desc}-{water;AQUA;wardance.water_uppercut.desc}. 
This change is limited by your style: if your style does not support the next color, this skill will attempt to skip to the one after that, until it finds a color you can change into. 
However, changing according to the pattern grants 0.1 rank.
wardance.earthen_sweep.name: Earthen Sweep
wardance.earthen_sweep.desc:
Sweep horizontally with your fist as a boulder, hitting a {40; UNDERLINE; increased every 10% skill effectiveness} degree sector in front of you, dealing double posture damage to targets with their main hand bound. 
Changes to {Iron Chop;LIGHT_GRAY; wardance.iron_chop.desc} after attack.
wardance.iron_chop.name: Iron Chop
wardance.iron_chop.desc:
Cleave with your open palm as an axe, throwing your target {downwards; UNDERLINE; force increased by skill effectiveness} with added fall damage if not parried.
Equipping Iron Chop grants a free parry. 
Changes to {Water Uppercut;AQUA; wardance.water_uppercut.desc} after attack.
wardance.water_uppercut.name: Water Uppercut
wardance.water_uppercut.desc:
Punch your target upwards with the force of a wellspring if not parried. This attack treats the target as having one lower level of alertness (alert->distracted->unaware).
Changes to {Wooden Jab;GOLD;wardance.wooden_jab.desc} after attack.
wardance.wooden_jab.name: Wooden Jab
wardance.wooden_jab.desc:
Strike forwards as if a sprouting sapling, gaining 1 attack reach when unarmed and significantly increasing knockback upon dealing damage. 
Changes to {Fiery Lunge;RED;wardance.fiery_lunge.desc} after attack.
wardance.fiery_lunge.name: Fiery Lunge
wardance.fiery_lunge.desc:
Lunge forward with the force of a wildfire in your fist, gaining half a second of invulnerability and {binding; UNDERLINE; time increased by skill effectiveness} the main hand of the target. 
Changes to {Earthen Sweep;DARK_GREEN; wardance.earthen_sweep.desc} after attack.
wardance.fatal_cadence.name: Fatal Cadence
wardance.fatal_cadence.desc: Every fourth skill cast gains {+40%;GREEN; wardance.skill.enhancement.default} skill effectiveness.
advancements.wardance.root.title: The Dance of Combat
advancements.wardance.root.description: Use the manual you were spawned with to learn and equip a basic skill kit. There are missing slots, you can fill them in as you learn more.
advancements.wardance.shadowless.title: Wong Fei Hung
advancements.wardance.shadowless.descrip: Land 7 consecutive Shadowless Kicks in a single cast.
advancements.wardance.flame_dance.title: EXPLOOOOOOSION
advancements.wardance.flame_dance.descri: Detonate 50 stacks of Flame Dance in a single hit.
advancements.wardance.survivor.title: Tis but a Flesh Wound!
advancements.wardance.survivor.descripti: Recover back to full health with Survivor.
advancements.wardance.prideful_might.des: Max out your might with Prideful Might... then lose it all in a single hit.
advancements.wardance.berserk.title: Overcompensation
advancements.wardance.berserk.descriptio: Dual wield two-handed weapons while under the effects of Berserk.
advancements.wardance.gamblers_whimsy.de: Roll a skill effectiveness above 2 with Gambler's Whimsy.
advancements.wardance.bite_the_dust.desc: Stack more than 6 Bite the Dust marks on a single target.
advancements.wardance.leverage.title: Long Arm of the Law
advancements.wardance.leverage.descripti: Attack with Leverage when more than 4 blocks away to get 200% base crit damage.
